## Step 5

Go to the Excel Program, go to the second sheet and replace `first half` and `second half` with the mess above.

## Step 6

Select all `CTRL A` go to `Data` tab (above), click on `Text to Columns` and click on as followed:

* Delimited
* Comma (only)
* Finish (nothing to click here)

## Step 7

Select `CTRL Shift Right Arrow` and copy paste first part to cell `E3` and second part to `AOG3`

## Step 8

Copi pasta dat answser 2 get dem fweeee pointz boiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiii
